channel.title: The Bug of Weird spam
channel.description: #### What happened? well, n7 or n8 i checked a person as sheriff, and when the timer reached 0, there was a lag of about 15 seconds. after that, suddenly there was a lot of system spam(2 yellow msgs that some1 left, 2 msgs that the pep was not sus - repeated.) and then some msg came 'there was a coding error' and before i could screenshot, it went to the find game screen. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? game should go smoothly. #### Steps to reproduce: this log.output_log.txt (294.7 KB) #### Comments: any1 else who had this?

item.title: The Bug of Weird spam
item.dc:creator: Aurelia
item.description:
Have you considered if your connection was to blame here? maybe just a slight DIP?

Read full topic

item.title: The Bug of Weird spam
item.dc:creator: stephenboss
item.description:
What happened?

well, n7 or n8 i checked a person as sheriff, and when the timer reached 0, there was a lag of about 15 seconds. after that, suddenly there was a lot of system spam(2 yellow msgs that some1 left, 2 msgs that the pep was not sus - repeated.) and then some msg came ‘there was a coding error’ and before i could screenshot, it went to the find game screen.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

game should go smoothly.

Steps to reproduce:

this log.output_log.txt (294.7 KB)

Comments: any1 else who had this?

Read full topic
